pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Lazer's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver_lazer)Gamer Driver (Lazer)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Lazer's $(l:ex_aid/riders/lazer#bike_2)Bike Gamer Level 1/2$(/l)
